title: r/Maliciouscompliance I Got $45,000 For Reporting My Boss To The Feds!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP works for a boss who thinks that he can get away with stealing software and using trial versions of programs illegally. When the bossman tries to screw over OP, OP retaliates by turning his boss over to the authorities. The boss ends up paying a $1,000,000 fine, and OP is rewarded with a $45,000 payout. Thanks for the severance package, boss!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
